price: Nuko turavuga tuti “Yewe Adamu! Mu by’ukuri uyu ni umwanzi wawe, wowe n’umugore wawe. Bityo, muramenye ntazabakure mu ijuru mutazavaho mukagorwa.”
arabic: فَقُلۡنَا يَٰٓـَٔادَمُ إِنَّ هَٰذَا عَدُوّٞ لَّكَ وَلِزَوۡجِكَ فَلَا يُخۡرِجَنَّكُمَا مِنَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ فَتَشۡقَىٰٓ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: faqul'nā yāādamu inna hādhā ʿaduwwun laka walizawjika falā yukh'rijannakumā mina al-janati fatashqā
